metadata.description: Short-term trading strategy with seed algorithms and variants for 1-4 week positions
metadata.author: Algorithm Discovery System

current_algorithm.name: Advanced Short-Term Momentum
current_algorithm.description: Advanced short-term algorithm with sector rotation and momentum confirmation

v1.0.name: Basic Price Momentum
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.2 and latest close > 100 ) )

v1.1.name: Multi-Factor Momentum
v1.1.description: Momentum with RSI and volume confirmation
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest close > latest ema ( latest close , 20 ) and latest rsi( 14 ) > 55 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 80 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.3 and latest close / 5 days ago close > 1.02 ) )

v1.2.name: Acceleration Momentum
v1.2.description: Momentum with price acceleration and institutional volume
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest close / 10 days ago close > 1.05 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.5 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 60 and latest close > latest ema ( latest close , 50 ) and market cap > 1000 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Sector Leaders
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.2 and latest close / 20 day ago close > 1.03 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 50 ) )

v1.1.name: Relative Strength Leaders
v1.1.description: Stocks with relative strength vs market
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest close / 20 days ago close > 1.08 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.4 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 55 and latest close > 200 ) )

v1.2.name: Institutional Rotation
v1.2.description: Large cap rotation with institutional interest
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.8 and latest close / 30 days ago close > 1.1 and market cap > 2000 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 50 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 75 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Range Breakout
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > 20 days ago high and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.5 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 55 and latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) ) )

v1.1.name: Volume Confirmed Breakout
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > 30 days ago high and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 2 and latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest rsi( 14 ) > 60 and latest close / 5 days ago close > 1.03 ) )

v1.2.name: Multi-Timeframe Breakout
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > 30 days ago max ( 1 , latest high ) and latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 2.2 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 55 and latest close / 20 days ago close > 1.08 and market cap > 500 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Mean Reversion
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest rsi( 14 ) < 60 and 3 days ago rsi( 14 ) < latest rsi( 14 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.2 ) )

v1.1.name: Pullback Reversal
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest close < latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest rsi( 14 ) < 55 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 30 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.3 and latest close / 30 days ago close > 0.95 ) )

v1.2.name: Support Zone Reversal
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) * 0.95 and latest close < latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) * 1.05 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 50 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 35 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.4 and 5 days ago close < latest close ) )

v1.0.0.name: Basic Short-Term Trends
v1.0.0.description: Initial short-term algorithm with basic trend following

v1.1.0.name: Enhanced Trend Detection
v1.1.0.description: Enhanced algorithm with improved trend identification

v1.3.0.name: Experimental High-Performance Short-Term
v1.3.0.description: Experimental version with latest variants for short-term trading

trend_persistence.description: Trend likely to persist for weeks
